title: Analyzing the Role of Stakeholders in Organizational Learning: Critical Theory-Based Simulation Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of Organizational Learning Theory and Scientific Problem-Solving Methods
context.additional_context: Simulation-based training for science field practitioners to analyze interactions among diverse stakeholders within organizations and design organizational learning strategies through critical thinking.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze conflicts between technical interests (economic efficiency) and lifeworld interests (practitioner experience) through at least three case studies in organizational learning processes
Learners can propose at least two optimal organizational learning strategies for resolving stakeholder conflicts using VR simulations
Learners can write improvement plans for stakeholder-based organizational learning processes by applying a scientific problem-solving framework

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
